title: New: Gotye – Somebody That I Used To Know (Groundislava Remix)
body:
After you’ve been subjected to a track for the Millionth time, to seal the deal, what you really need is a remix of said track.

Now before anyone freaks, I’m rather fond of **Gotye**’s ‘_Somebody That I Used To Know_’, that said, if another kid proudly puts it on at a house party as if it’s some sort of grand discovery, I might have to kill them.

Cynicism aside, L.A based producer [**Groundislava**’s](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6909-new-ground-is-lava-animal/ "New: Ground Is Lava – Animal") take on last years’ hit is a slightly farcical, yet welcome cut of the record.

Ok, maybe not all the cynicism aside, it is me after all.
